typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		kod_okresu as string,
		nazev_okresu as string,
		{CZ-NUTS4} as string,
		nazev_kraje as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> LAU
source(output(
		nazev_kraje as string,
		{CZ-NUTS3} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> NUTS
source(output(
		id as string,
		datum as string,
		kraj_nuts_kod as string,
		okres_lau_kod as string,
		prirustkovy_pocet_testu_okres as string,
		kumulativni_pocet_testu_okres as string,
		prirustkovy_pocet_testu_kraj as string,
		kumulativni_pocet_testu_kraj as string,
		prirustkovy_pocet_prvnich_testu_okres as string,
		kumulativni_pocet_prvnich_testu_okres as string,
		prirustkovy_pocet_prvnich_testu_kraj as string,
		kumulativni_pocet_prvnich_testu_kraj as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Downloaded
Downloaded, LAU join(okres_lau_kod == {CZ-NUTS4},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLAU
JoinLAU, NUTS join(kraj_nuts_kod == {CZ-NUTS3},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinNUTS
JoinNUTS select(mapColumn(
		id,
		datum,
		kraj_nuts_kod,
		okres_lau_kod,
		prirustkovy_pocet_testu_okres,
		kumulativni_pocet_testu_okres,
		prirustkovy_pocet_testu_kraj,
		kumulativni_pocet_testu_kraj,
		prirustkovy_pocet_prvnich_testu_okres,
		kumulativni_pocet_prvnich_testu_okres,
		prirustkovy_pocet_prvnich_testu_kraj,
		kumulativni_pocet_prvnich_testu_kraj,
		kod_okresu,
		nazev_okresu,
		{CZ-NUTS4},
		nazev_kraje = LAU@nazev_kraje,
		nazev_kraje = NUTS@nazev_kraje,
		{CZ-NUTS3}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Save
